name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident (T1059)
description: This playbook addresses the incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts that led to a data breach by exfiltrating sensitive data from the compromised host.

action--ff1739e9-e6ea-499e-bfd0-79072fd5.name: Kill malicious processes
action--ff1739e9-e6ea-499e-bfd0-79072fd5.description: Terminate any processes executing malicious scripts to prevent further damage.

action--fa2085f1-2354-424a-9283-ee1cce52.name: Isolate compromised host
action--fa2085f1-2354-424a-9283-ee1cce52.description: Take the compromised host offline to prevent further data exfiltration.

loop--c9e524a5-685d-469b-b558-dcdf7e9490.name: Malware Scan Loop
loop--c9e524a5-685d-469b-b558-dcdf7e9490.description: Run a malware scan and repeat until the system is clean.

action--c9e524a5-685d-469b-b558-dcdf7e94.name: Run malware scan on network
action--c9e524a5-685d-469b-b558-dcdf7e94.description: Perform a malware scan on the affected host to identify other possible threats.

scan_status.description: The status of the malware scan (clean or infected).

action--5f9c5f24-f7fd-4f21-9cee-8c88baf9.name: Review firewall rules
action--5f9c5f24-f7fd-4f21-9cee-8c88baf9.description: Review existing firewall rules to identify potential unauthorized access.

action--9a567b77-2c8a-4a3b-aef2-bc3aca84.name: Update incident response logs
action--9a567b77-2c8a-4a3b-aef2-bc3aca84.description: Log the incident details for future reference and analysis.
